review: Excellent, fantastic, great unit, works far beyond my highest expectations.  It is truly plug and play, so easy to install and set up. BUT, BE SURE TO PURCHASE from Kindle books THE GUIDE TO OPERATING FIRE TV.  This unit is so powerful, you need help to unlock all the fabulous features and which apps you really want to add.  I give it five stars and fully recommend Amazon Fire TV.  The backup and support from Amazon is amazing.  Almost continuous updates and new apps.  Definitely purchase Amazon Prime, it goes hand and hand with Fire TV.
